title: Smartarget Exit Popup
shortDescription: Show users special offer before they leave your website
longDescription:
Keep users from leaving your website !
If you have a question or problem please email us: cloudflare@toptab.net

Exit Popup allowning you to show a message to users who move their mouse courser in attention to close your website tab. 
With Exit Popup you can design your popup message and call-to-action to attrack the user and prevent his leaving
author: TopSoft UG

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Limited features. Visible on homepage only.

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: No limitations. Visible on all pages. Still FREE!

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

bodyText.default: Up to 15% off for limited time and on selected items. plus free shipping for the first 100 buyers
bodyText.title: Body Text String

btnLink.description: URL to jump to (complete path with https:// or https://)
btnLink.title: Link

designMode.description: Use that mode to design the popup easily. DON'T FORGET TO SET IT OFF WHEN THE DESIGN IS READY
designMode.title: Design Mode

versions.releaseNotes: First release with main functionality to create Exit Popup

descriptionItem.helpvalue:
Get many more apps for free on Smartarget.online

Click to call - Allow users to call you within one click

Ribbon corner - Promote special offers in one click

Exit popup - Show users special offer before they leave your website

And more...

idUser.description: Get your User ID in the Integration page
idUser.title: User ID

smartarget_popup_frequency.description: Set -1 to disable popup, 0 to display popup only once, and 1 or more to display popup every n days (for example: 30 = display popup every 30 days)
smartarget_popup_frequency.title: Popup frequency

smartarget_text.default: Any unique offer before user exit the site
smartarget_text.title: Text

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Show the Exit Popup on Homepage only
products.longDescription: Show the Exit Popup on Homepage only

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: Show the Exit Popup on ALL pages
products.longDescription: Get Exit Popup and free more apps (include exit popup) to improve your website

versions.releaseNotes: New version with many bug fixes and new features

descriptionItem.helpvalue:
Get many more apps for free on Smartarget.online

Click to call - Allow users to call you within one click

Ribbon corner - Promote special offers in one click

Instagram Follow Us - Get more Instagram followers

And more...

You chose Free plan.

Show app on homepage only
powered by Smartarget label
Limited app options

Use Smartarget Integration (Free Plus plan) with no limitations.

You chose Free plus plan.

It's also Free!
Show app on all pages
Change app options
Analytics reports
More free apps

Follow these steps to complete integration:

1. Create a Smartarget account or log in to yours
2. Add your website and configure Exit Popup app for your website
3. Go to Integration and copy the User ID to the input text box to this page
